subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Television
lead_paragraph: Bob Costas’s longevity at NBC has fed the notion that he is highly visible in each Olympic show, but he was on screen for a mere 5 minutes 28 seconds on Monday.
snippet: Bob Costas’s longevity at NBC has fed the notion that he is highly visible in each Olympic show, but he was on screen for a mere 5 minutes 28 seconds on Monday.
